kw.msg: ${replace_data_salary} = xpath=//*[@id="salary"]/descendant::*[text()='มากกว่า 50,000 บาท'][2]

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//*[@id="salary"]/descendant::*[text()='มากกว่า 50,000 บาท'][2]'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
